author: IGN
description:
It's about that time of the year again! Nintendo's second big Direct livestream will happen this Friday September 12th at 6am PT | 9am ET. The Nintendo Direct will be about an hour in length with a major focus on what's coming for the Nintendo Switch 2 console, as well as the original Switch platform. Join IGN as we watch along with everything showcased through the stream. Stick around after as our Nintendo experts from NVC give reactions and expert opinions on everything announced at the September Nintendo Direct. 

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Nintendo Direct Livestream: IGN Watch Party and NVC Post-Show

author: IGN
description:
Twisted gravity and SCP-inspired monsters are waiting for you. Active Matter is out now in Early Access on PC via Gaijin.net. Watch the latest Active Matter trailer for this hardcore online shooter game. Active Matter will be available on Steam, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 (PS5) in 2026.

In Active Matter, players enter a twisted multiverse filled with SCP-inspired monsters, gravity-defying anomalies, and intense PvPvE and PvE raids. Explore Dalniy Island and lush African landscapes solo or in squads of up to three. Use anomalies like wall-running zones and destructive ball lightning to outsmart enemies and survive massive boss battles.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Active Matter - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
HyperYuki is a high-speed, trick-fueled snowboarding bonanza wrapped in a slick, retro-futurist Y2K aesthetic, inspired by 90s legends like Cool Boarders and SSX. Shred through eight over-the-top courses packed with chances to pull off jaw-dropping tricks, all set to an electrifying soundtrack featuring YMCK, Trasto NueveVidas, and more! Watch the Hyper Yuki trailer to see snowboarding action and more of what you can expect ahead of the game's release on PC.

#IGN
title: HyperYuki: Snowboard Syndicate - Official Teaser Trailer | Play Acclaim Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Katanaut is available now on PC. Watch the Katanaut launch trailer for this fast-paced, Metroidvania-inspired action roguelite blending fluid combat and cosmic horror. The Katanaut launch trailer showcases gameplay and the horrifying foes you'll face. In Katanaut, slash, dodge, and wield powerful abilities as you battle through a station sprawling with twisted, once-human horrors. Adapt, survive, and descend into the shadows to uncover dark secrets.

#IGN
title: Katanaut - Official Launch Trailer | Play Acclaim Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Little Nightmares 3, the third entry in Bandai Namco’s horror puzzle-platformer series, is designed to be a completely cooperative two-player adventure (though it can be played solo if you like), and based on the level I played, it’s shaping up to fit the same niche as puzzly co-op classics like Split Fiction and Unravel Two. Previewed by Logan Plant

#IGN #Gaming
title: Little Nightmares 3: The Final Preview

author: IGN
description:
IGN’s Seth Macy is your eyes and ears on the ground in Seattle for PAX West 2025, getting first looks at awesome games like Resident Evil: Requiem, Pokémon Legends: Z-A, Final Fantasy 7 on Nintendo Switch 2, exciting card games and accessories like Riftbound, Dice Throne, 4 Dogz Customz, and even PC hardware and accessories from Framework, Razer, and more! This is your PAX 2025 recap.
Presented by the Army National Guard.

#IGN
title: The Coolest Things We Saw | PAX West 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Overview Trailer for the new PlayStation Family App, a new simplified Parental Controls phone app developed by Sony. Parents can keep track of their child's gaming with an easy-to-use activity report, simple parental controls, and real-time info directly to the app. Learn more with the latest trailer for the PlayStation Family App, available now on iOS and Android.

#IGN #Gaming #PlayStation
title: PlayStation Family App - Official Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
On Halloween night, teen magician Max finds herself locked in a brutal showdown with the Jester, a nightmarish and supernatural trickster with real dark magic and a killer act. 

As illusions turn lethal and every escape is a trap, Max must pull off the ultimate trick: staying alive. On this deadly night, the only escape… is to beat the devil at its own game.

The Jester 2 is in theaters on September 15 and 16, 2025.
title: The Jester 2 - Exclusive Clip (2025)

author: IGN
description:
After a massive solar flare destroys the Earth's eastern hemisphere, an emboldened treasure hunter for-hire adventures to Europe to uncover the coveted Mona Lisa, only to learn the world needs a hero more than it needs a painting.

The film stars Dave Bautista, Olga Kurylenko, Kristofer Hivju and Samuel L. Jackson. Afterburn opens in theaters on September 19, 2025.
title: Afterburn: Exclusive Red Band Clip (2025) Dave Bautista, Phil Zimmerman

author: IGN
description:
Die a devil or live as a devil hunter. Your choice. Check out this Chainsaw Man series recap (dub version) to get caught up ahead of the Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc release in theaters on October 24, 2025.

For the first time, Chainsaw Man slashes his way onto the big screen in an epic, action-fueled adventure that continues the hugely popular anime series. Denji worked as a Devil Hunter for the yakuza, trying to pay off the debt he inherited from his parents, until the yakuza betrayed him and had him killed. As he was losing consciousness, Denji’s beloved chainsaw-powered devil-dog, Pochita, made a deal with Denji and saved his life. This fused the two together, creating the unstoppable Chainsaw Man. Now, in a brutal war between devils, hunters, and secret enemies, a mysterious girl named Reze has stepped into his world, and Denji faces his deadliest battle yet, fueled by love in a world where survival knows no rules.

Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc is based on the origina
title: Chainsaw Man - Official Series Recap Video (Dub)

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc trailer (dub version) for this upcoming animated action film. Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc, directed by Tatsuya Yoshihara, releases in theaters on October 24, 2025.

Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc is based on
title: Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc - Official Trailer #2 (Dub)

author: IGN
description:
Spinal Tap II: The End Continues sees rock icons David St. Hubbins, Nigel Tufnel, and Derek Smalls returning to the big screen for the first time in over 40 years. But there have been loads of rock moments in film since then, so we asked the members of Spinal Tap to give us their opinions on how the genre has been represented in pop culture since they changed the game with This Is Spinal Tap.

Spinal Tap II: The End Continues is in theaters on September 12th.

#IGN
title: Spinal Tap React to the Greatest Rock & Roll Moments In Movie History

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into what you can expect from The Sims 4: Adventure Awaits in this new gameplay trailer for the upcoming expansion, which brings imaginary friends, activities, Getaways, the ability to create Custom Venues, and new skills like entomology, diving, archery, and papercrafts. The Sims 4: Adventure Awaits will be available on EA App PC/Mac, Steam, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4 (PS4), and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on October 2 at 10AM PT.

Get ready to break free from the everyday with daring activities and Getaways. Getaways are more than vacations, they are experiences you design! Set a schedule and even add rules. Elimination Rules – like skill or relationship gains – will have Sims competing to outlast each other. Create a kids’ camp, fitness retreat, romantic contest, or anything else you can imagine!

Also, create Custom Venues, where you can design, build and decorate, deciding what kinds of activities and roles are assigned. Share your creation to the Gallery fo
title: The Sims 4: Adventure Awaits - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Fruits of Immortality' Season 4 Battle Pass Trailer for Marvel Rivals, the hit team-based hero shooter developed by NetEase Games. Players can get a look at the new content coming with Season 4, with 10 costumes and exclusive cosmetics, including free rewards. Gain access to Captain America's Golden Age and Magneto's The Trial Of Magneto costumes, and upgrade to unlock even more treasures hidden within the immortal fruit. Progress through the 'Fruits of Immortality' Season 4 Battle Pass for Marvel Rivals, launching on September 12 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#MarvelRivals #Gaming #IGN
title: Marvel Rivals - Official 'Fruits of Immortality' Season 4 Battle Pass Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Nintendo Switch 2 Live Action Trailer for Cronos: The New Dawn, a third-person action horror survival game developed by Bloober Team. Players can take the horrors of Cronos: The New Dawn with them on the go with the Nintendo Switch 2 version. Embody the Traveler to solve environmental puzzles, defeat enemies, and more in Cronos: The New Dawn, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.

#CronosTheNewDawn #Gaming #IGN
title: Cronos: The New Dawn - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Live Action Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The developers of Godbreakers treat you for a gameplay deep-dive from the upcoming third-person co-op hack-and-slash action game where players absorb the powers of the enemies they slay from run to run in a roguelike-style design. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2687400/GODBREAKERS/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Godbreakers - Official Gameplay Deep-Dive

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Deep of Night Overview Trailer for Elden Ring Nightreign, the critically acclaimed multiplayer roguelite spin-off of the action RPG developed by FromSoftware. Players will soon gain access to Deep of Night difficulty mode in a free update that offers a high difficulty mode with enhanced enemies. Fight through a suite of challenges to take on the Night Lords in Deep of Night difficulty mode for Elden Ring Nightreign, launching later today for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#EldenRingNightreign #Gaming #IGN
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Official Deep of Night Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get your first look at Living Hell, a co-op horror game for up to four players that drops you into the world of Pelican City, where the ozone layer has collapsed and solar radiation has created all sorts of mutated monsters that the government wants you to go out and collect samples of. With a choice of eight playable characters, you'll battle over a dozen creepy enemies while traversing six handcrafted districts where they layout is never the same twice. 

Wishlist Living Hell on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3078760/LIVING_HELL/

#IGN
title: Living Hell - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Mega Malamar Reveal Trailer for Pokemon Legends: Z-A, the next third-person open-world installment to the creature-collecting franchise developed by The Pokemon Company. Players can get a look at Mega Malamar in action with Malamar's hypnotic abilities, allowing it to overwrite the personalities or even memories of others. Catch Mega Malamar in Pokemon Legends: Z-A, launching on October 16 for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2.

#PokemonLegendsZA #MegaMalamar #Gaming
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - Official Mega Malamar Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Developer Light Brick Studios goes into detail on the gameplay mechanics and inspirations behind LEGO Voyagers, their upcoming two-player, mandatory-co-op physics-based puzzle platforming adventure game set in a brick-built LEGO world. It will be released on September 15 for PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch (1 and 2), and PC for $24.99 Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1538550/LEGO_Voyagers/ 

#IGN #Gaming
title: LEGO Voyagers - Official Developer Diary

author: IGN
description:
SunderBound is a co-op top-down shooter with roguelite progression set in a crumbling mega-tower. Survive floor by floor with a partner you trust, or an AI companion if you’re climbing solo. Every room’s a test. Every upgrade’s earned. And the only way out is up. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1477750/SunderBound/

#IGN #Gaming
title: SunderBound - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In the lead up to Borderlands 4 coming out on September 12th we decided to take a look back at our previous reviews for Borderlands 1, Borderlands 2, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, Borderlands 3 and of course we had to include the honorable mention of Tiny Tina's Wonderlands. 

Keep it locked to IGN for Borderlands 4 Review and Borderlands 4 gameplay.
title: Every Mainline Borderlands Review... So Far

author: IGN
description:
Lost Soul Aside reviewed by Charlie Wacholz on PlayStation 5. Also available on PC.
Lost Soul Aside would’ve been a great character action game if it hadn’t gone out of its way to do anything outside of that. Cosplaying as a Final Fantasy game, its wheel-spinning story doesn’t go anywhere and an unmemorable cast of (often derivative) characters are played by actors who aren’t given much to work with. Boring level design is going through the motions at best and annoyingly unskippable at worst, and it’s loaded with painfully poor 3D platforming sequences and extremely basic puzzles. Next time it should really just stick to combat.
title: Lost Soul Aside Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for the anime movie 100 Meters! In select theatres October 10. In theatres nationwide October 12-14.

100 METERS follows Togashi, a track star who is born to run. As a kid, he is naturally gifted and wins every 100-meter race without effort. But in sixth grade, he meets Komiya, a transfer student who is full of determination but lacks technique. In teaching him, Togashi gives Komiya a new purpose: to win no matter what. Years pass by, and Togashi and Komiya meet again as rivals on the track and reveal their true selves.

#IGN #Anime
title: 100 METERS - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)
